    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="593695544__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="593695544__tab0" class="dropdown-text">What services can I access through HSBC Online Banking? </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="593695544__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_3">
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100 ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_3" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_2" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">We offer two log on options for HSBC Online Banking to give you greater flexibility and convenience.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">With memorable answer (if applicable<sup>*</sup>) and password, you can access these services:</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Account information</p> 
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>eStatement and eAdvice</li> 
 <li>Real-time account balance</li> 
 <li>Transaction history</li> 
</ul> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Banking services<br> </p> 
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>Transfers (to yourself or to registered accounts)</li> 
 <li>Apply debit card</li> 
 <li>Time deposits</li> 
 <li>Foreign currency exchange</li> 
 <li>Mortgage services</li> 
 <li>MPF/ ORSO services</li> 
</ul> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Insurance services</p> 
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>Insurance policy overview</li> 
 <li>Family Protector<br> </li> 
 <li>Travel insurance</li> 
 <li>FirstCare Plus Medical insurance</li> 
 <li>Hospital Cash insurance</li> 
 <li>Accident insurance<br> </li> 
 <li>Home insurance</li> 
 <li>Fire insurance</li> 
 <li>Helper insurance<br> </li> 
 <li>Motor insurance</li> 
</ul> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><sup>*</sup>If the new log on enhancements to HSBC Online Banking are already available to you, your memorable answer will no longer be needed. <a href="/digital/logon-update/#online-banking">Learn more</a>.<br> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">With <strong>Mobile Security Key or Security Device log on</strong>, you can access <strong>all</strong> services above, plus:</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><u>Banking services</u></p> 
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>Transfers (to non-registered accounts)</li> 
 <li>Global View (HSBC Premier Elite/Premier/One customers only)</li> 
 <li>Bill payment</li> 
 <li>Account opening</li> 
 <li>Credit card PIN request</li> 
</ul> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><u>Investment services</u></p> 
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>Investment portfolio overview</li> 
 <li>Wealth management portfolio overview</li> 
 <li>Stocks trading</li> 
 <li>IPO</li> 
 <li>Corporate actions</li> 
 <li>Stocks alerts</li> 
 <li>Stock monthly investment plan</li> 
 <li>Unit trusts</li> 
 <li>Unit trust monthly investment plan</li> 
 <li>Deposit Plus</li> 
 <li>Equity Linked Investments and Structured Notes</li> 
 <li>Structured investment deposits</li> 
 <li>Bonds / Certificates of Deposit</li> 
 <li>Gold trading</li> 
</ul> 
<div>
 <u>Credit services</u>
</div> 
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>Credit card application</li> 
 <li>Personal loan application</li> 
 <li>Credit card limit increase</li> 
 <li>Block and unblock card</li> 
 <li>Octopus AAVS</li> 
 <li>Report lost and card replacement</li> 
</ul> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><u>Personal Settings</u></p> 
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>eAlert service registration</li> 
 <li>Update personal information</li> 
 <li>autoPay set up or modification</li> 
</ul>
</div></div>

            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="content_main_advanced_expander_4" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="1512231543__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="1512231543__tab0" class="dropdown-text">What kind of system do I need to have to use HSBC Online Banking? </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="1512231543__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_6">
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100 ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_6" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_5" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">To use Online Banking from a computer, you'll need an internet connection and a popular browser installed like Microsoft Edge, Firefox, Chrome or Safari.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You'll also need to have Cookies and JavaScript enabled on your browser.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You can also download the HSBC Mobile Banking App to access Personal Internet Banking via your mobile device.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="content_main_advanced_expander_5" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    <div class="anchor" id="how-to-register-for-Personal-internet-banking"></div>

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="-371103388__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="-371103388__tab0" class="dropdown-text">How can I register for Personal Internet Banking? </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="-371103388__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_7">
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100 ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_7" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_6" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You only need to register once on the HSBC HK App to get access to HSBC Online and Mobile Banking. Please keep your valid mobile number and email address updated on your bank record.</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You can verify your identity using any of the following methods. <a href="/campaigns/prom203/#accordion-log-on-with-security-code-on-trusted-browser-i-am-new-to-digital">Learn more</a>.</p>
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL">
 <li><strong>Valid HKID / passport (same as your bank record)<br> </strong>- Applicable to holders of  New Smart HKID (2018 version)* as well as <a href="/mobile/faq/#id-to-verify-my-identity">supported passports</a><br> - Applicable to customers aged 18 or above<br> - Not applicable to customers holding HSBC MPF or ORSO Defined Contribution Scheme accounts only</li>
 <li><strong>HSBC bank account number and related ATM PIN or Phone Banking PIN</strong></li>
 <li><strong>HSBC credit card number and related ATM PIN</strong></li>
 <li><strong>HSBC MPF or ORSO Defined Contribution Scheme account number and last 6 digits of mobile number</strong></li>
 <li><strong>HSBC Mastercard® Debit Card number and related ATM PIN</strong></li>
</ul>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Once you've completed the registration, you can activate your Mobile Security Key, set up your 6-digit Mobile Banking PIN and enable biometric authentication. Start exploring a wide range of features and services on the HSBC HK App.</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"> </p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>If you have questions, please call our Customer Services:</strong></p>
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL">
 <li>HSBC Global Private Banking customers: <a href="tel:+85222333033" class="no-link" role="presentation">(852) 2233 3033</a></li>
 <li>HSBC Premier Elite customers: <a href="tel:+85222333033" class="no-link" role="presentation">(852) 2233 3033</a></li>
 <li>HSBC Premier customers: <a href="tel:+85222333322" class="no-link" role="presentation">(852) 2233 3322</a></li>
 <li>Other customers: <a href="tel:+85222333000" class="no-link" role="presentation">(852) 2233 3000</a></li>
</ul>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">* Please make sure the HKID shows the complete date, month as well as date of birth.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="content_main_advanced_expander_6" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="2098727717__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="2098727717__tab0" class="dropdown-text">Can I use HSBC Online Banking without an HSBC account? </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="2098727717__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_8">
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100 ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_8" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_7" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">No. Learn more about <a href="#how-to-register-for-Personal-internet-banking">how to register for Personal Internet Banking</a>.</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">If you only have an HSBC MPF and/or ORSO Defined Contribution Scheme account, you can only use the MPF/ORSO-related features on HSBC Online Banking.</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Please note, you do not need to register to apply online for an HSBC Personal Loan, TravelSurance, HomeSurance or AccidentSurance cover.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="content_main_advanced_expander_7" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="472129202__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="472129202__tab0" class="dropdown-text">I do not have an account with HSBC. How do I open one? </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="472129202__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_9">
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100 ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_9" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_8" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You may open an HSBC account via HSBC HK App with just a few steps. <a href="/campaigns/prom189/" target="_self">Learn more</a>.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Alternatively, you may visit any HSBC branch in Hong Kong.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="content_main_advanced_expander_8" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="-88578824__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="-88578824__tab0" class="dropdown-text">My Personal Internet Banking registration was rejected. What should I do? </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="-88578824__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_10">
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100 ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_10" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_9" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Please try again. If you're using your HKID / passport (same as your bank record) to verify your identity, please make sure of the following.</p>
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL">
 <li>You are using a New Smart HKID (2018 version)* or <a href="/mobile/faq/#id-to-verify-my-identity">supported passport</a>.</li>
 <li>You are aged 18 or above.</li>
 <li>You are not only holding an HSBC MPF or ORSO Defined Contribution Scheme account.</li>
 <li>The images you capture are clear and readable.</li>
</ul>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">If you're using your account details to verify your identity, please make sure you enter the correct account number and associated PIN or mobile number as well as the latest ID document details you provided when you opened your account.</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">* Please make sure your HKID shows your complete date, month as well as date of birth.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="content_main_advanced_expander_9" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="992308272__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="992308272__tab0" class="dropdown-text">What is a username? </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="992308272__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_11">
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100 ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_11" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_10" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">This is the name you use for identification when accessing Online Banking. Each username must be unique and should be different from the username you use on other websites.</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You should create a username which is 6-30 characters long. You can use a combination of numbers and letters. You can also use the following special characters: the at sign (@), period (.), underscore (_), hyphen (-) and apostrophe (').</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="content_main_advanced_expander_10" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="-940885128__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="-940885128__tab0" class="dropdown-text">What is a password? </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="-940885128__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_12">
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100 ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_12" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_11" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">This is your secret word or code used to log on to HSBC Online Banking.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Your secret password should be 8-30 characters long. You can use a combination of numbers and letters. You can also use the following special characters: the at sign (@), underscore (_), apostrophe ('), period (.), hyphen (-), question mark (?), exclamation mark (!), the dollar sign ($), asterisk (*) and the equals sign (=).</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="content_main_advanced_expander_11" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="971181586__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="971181586__tab0" class="dropdown-text">If I have an MPF account, should I choose "MPF or ORSO Defined Contribution Scheme" when registering for Personal Internet Banking? </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="971181586__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_13">
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100 ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_13" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_12" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Yes, in case that your MPF account is your only account. However, if you have other HSBC accounts, you may choose to verify your identity using your HKID / passport or your other account details and associated PIN. <a href="/campaigns/prom203/#accordion-log-on-with-security-code-on-trusted-browser-i-am-new-to-digital">Learn more</a>.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>

    </div>

    </div>

</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="content_main_advanced_expander_12" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="2129768902__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="2129768902__tab0" class="dropdown-text">How long will it take before I can start trading using Online Banking? </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="2129768902__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_14">
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100 ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_14" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_13" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You can start trading instantly.<br> </p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="content_main_advanced_expander_13" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="725182611__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="725182611__tab0" class="dropdown-text">I have a Super Ease account. Which number should I use to register for Personal Internet Banking? </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="725182611__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_15">
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100 ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_15" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_14" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You can use the account number at the bottom of your Super Ease card, not your Visa card number. Then select phone banking or ATM - whichever is appropriate - together with the corresponding PIN. <br> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">If your Super Ease account is a joint account enter your Super Ease card issue number. However, this number may not be shown on some Super Ease cards. In this case, please check with your nearest HSBC branch.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_18" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Online Banking is free for all our customers. Naturally, some specialised transactions do incur fees: <br> </p>
</div></div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-NTCTBL-RW-DEV O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV" role="region"><div class="table-wrapper c-999" data-accessibility-tick-icon-text="available" data-accessibility-cross-icon-text="not available" id="content_main_notice_table_2">
     <table width="100%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="1" border="1">
<tbody><tr><th><strong>Service</strong><br>
</th>
<th colspan="3" valign="top"><strong>Charge</strong><br>
</th>
</tr><tr><td rowspan="5" valign="top"><strong>Transfer to another local bank or Stored Value Facilities (SVF) operator (including Hang Seng Bank)</strong><br>
</td>
<td colspan="3" valign="top">For transferring funds in Hong Kong dollar to another local bank or payment service provider, depending on the clearing system used, the following charge will be applied:<br>
</td>
</tr><tr><td valign="top"><strong>Payment System</strong><br>
</td>
<td colspan="2" valign="top"><strong>Charge</strong><br>
</td>
</tr><tr><td>FPS<br>
</td>
<td colspan="2">Waived*<br>
</td>
</tr><tr><td valign="top">Real Time Gross Settlement<br>
</td>
<td colspan="2" valign="top">Waived (please note that some receiving banks may impose additional charges.)</td>
</tr><tr><td colspan="3" valign="top">For transferring funds in foreign currencies or Renminbi to another bank in Hong Kong, free of charge or a service charge of HKD50 will be applied by us, depending on the payment system used by the receiving bank. The charge amount will be confirmed on your confirmation page on HSBC Online Banking / HSBC HK app (<strong>additional charges</strong> may also be applied by the receiving bank). </td>
</tr><tr><td valign="top"><strong>Transfer to overseas</strong><br>
</td>
<td colspan="3" valign="top">See all overseas transfer rates: https://www.hsbc.com.hk/fees/<br>
</td>
</tr><tr><td valign="top"><strong>Stocking trading</strong><br>
</td>
<td colspan="3" valign="top">0.25% commission<br>
</td>
</tr><tr><td rowspan="4" valign="top"><strong>Stock Quote Charge</strong><br>
</td>
<td colspan="3" valign="top">Any additional used real-time stock quotes exceeding your free real-time stock quote count will be charged at HKD0.1 per quote, and will be debited from your account in the first seven working days of the next month. (The maximum monthly charge for access to real-time stock quotes is HKD250).<br>
</td>
</tr><tr><td colspan="2" valign="top">HSBC Premier customers<br>
</td>

</td>
<td valign="top">500 free quotes per month<br>
</td>
</tr><tr><td colspan="3" valign="top">For every HKD50,000 local securities trading turnover, 200 free quotes will be added to your free real-time stock quote count in the first seven working days of the next month.<br>
</td>
</tr><tr><td valign="top"><strong>Market Live</strong><br>
</td>
<td colspan="3" valign="top">HKD380 per month. <br>
For every HKD1,000,000 local securities trading turnover, a one-month fee waiver for Markets Live will be awarded.<br>
</td>
</tr><tr><td><strong>Standing instructions</strong><br>
</td>
<td colspan="3">HKD150 for each standing instruction returned as a result of insufficient funds<br>
<br>
<strong>Charges for execution of a standing instruction for overseas transfer</strong><br>
<br>
<a href="/help/faq/internet-banking/sitt/" target="_self">See all overseas transfer rates</a></td>
</tr></tbody></table>

    <p class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">* There is no charge from us if you pay money to, or receive money from accounts from other banks via FPS, but other banks may have different charging policies.</p>

            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="-54485528__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">

<div id="content_main_columnControl_20">

            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_20" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">For your credit card account or investment account, you can view transactions for the last 60 calendar days.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">For your current account, savings account or Gold Account, you can view transactions that have taken place since your last bank statement.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">If you have a <strong>Passbook Savings account</strong> we'll show you any transactions that have not yet been printed on your passbook. However, if there are 41 or more transactions to display these transactions will be summed up and shown as <strong>Net Back items</strong> in the transaction history. You will not be able to view the individual details of these transactions.</p>
</div></div>

            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_22">

            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_22" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Although our Online Banking pages are built to meet all relevant web standards, using some older web browsers may cause minor display errors or prevent you from completing tasks online. Updating your browser to the latest version should resolve these issues.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">If you prefer not to upgrade now, you can continue to use Online Banking securely, but you may encounter errors on displayed pages.</p>

            <div class="O-TITLE-RW-DEV O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV" role="region"><div id="content_main_title_2">

    <h2 class="A-BBST28R-RW-ALL">

    </h2>
    <div class="row">

        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="1898726207__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="1898726207__tab0" class="dropdown-text">What if I forget my Personal Internet Banking username? </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="1898726207__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_26">
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100 ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_26" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_25" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You can retrieve your username on the online banking log on screen by selecting ‘Forgot your username or password' and then selecting ‘Recover username’. Please make sure you've registered a valid mobile number and email address. You'll need to provide your bank account number, ATM PIN and identification document number. We'll also send you a verification code via SMS that you'll need to enter to retrieve your username.</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Alternatively, you may also call our enquiry hotline for assistance:</p>
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL">
 <li>HSBC Global Private Banking customers: <a href="tel:+85222333033" class="no-link" role="presentation">(852) 2233 3033</a></li>
 <li>HSBC Premier Elite customers: <a href="tel:+85222333033" class="no-link" role="presentation">(852) 2233 3033</a></li>
 <li>HSBC Premier customers: <a href="tel:+85222333322" class="no-link" role="presentation">(852) 2233 3322</a></li>
 <li>Other customers: <a href="tel:+85222333000" class="no-link" role="presentation">(852) 2233 3000</a></li>
</ul>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Tip: In the call, please say 'Forgot username' when being asked about the purpose of your call to be directed to the relevant service.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="content_main_advanced_expander_24" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    <div class="anchor" id="pswd"></div>

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="2066849285__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="2066849285__tab0" class="dropdown-text">What if I forget my Personal Internet Banking password? </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="2066849285__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_27">
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100 ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_27" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_26" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">If you've forgotten your password, you can reset it by selecting 'Forgotten your password?' on the Personal Internet Banking log on screen. You'll need the answer to your security question and then generate a security code or input the SMS verification code sent by us to complete the reset.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">If you've forgotten both your password and security answer, you can</p> 
<ol class="A-LSTO-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>Select 'Forgotten your password?' on the Personal Internet Banking log on screen.</li> 
 <li>Select 'Account details and SMS one-time verification code'. Please make sure you have a valid mobile number and email address registered with us.</li> 
 <li>You'll need to provide your bank account number, ATM PIN and identification document number that you've maintained in our bank record.</li> 
 <li>You'll then be requested to input a SMS verification code sent by us for verification.</li> 
 <li>You’ll be able to reset password, security question and answer after verification. You may also reset password, security question and answer on the HSBC HK App.</li> 
</ol> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><br> If you're unable to use any of these methods, you can</p> 
<ol class="A-LSTO-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>Select 'Forgotten your password?' on the Personal Internet Banking log on screen.</li> 
 <li>Expand ‘I’m unable to use any of these methods’, and select ‘Reset security details and call us to complete the reset process’.</li> 
 <li>Enter a new password and select a new security question to answer</li> 
 <li>You'll then be given a unique reference number, which you will need to call our hotline to complete the process.</li> 
</ol>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="content_main_advanced_expander_25" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="904603026__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="904603026__tab0" class="dropdown-text">What format should I use for a secure username for HSBC Online Banking? </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="904603026__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_28">
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100 ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_28" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_27" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You should create a username which is 6-30 characters long. You can use a combination of numbers and letters. You can also use the following special characters: the at sign (@), period (.), underscore (_), hyphen (-) and apostrophe (').</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="content_main_advanced_expander_26" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="-1299785588__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="-1299785588__tab0" class="dropdown-text">What is the format for passwords for Personal Internet Banking? </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="-1299785588__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_29">
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100 ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_29" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_28" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Your secret password should be 8-30 characters long. You can use a combination of numbers and letters. You can also use the following special characters: the at sign (@), underscore (_), apostrophe ('), period (.), hyphen (-), question mark (?), exclamation mark (!), the dollar sign ($), asterisk (*) and the equals sign (=).<br> </p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="content_main_advanced_expander_27" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="-350231306__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="-350231306__tab0" class="dropdown-text">Can I change my Personal Internet Banking username and passwords? </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="-350231306__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_30">
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100 ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_30" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_29" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You can change your password at any time but your new password must be different from your username. <br> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You can only change your username by cancelling your existing Personal Internet Banking registration, waiting two working days, then re-registering with a different username. You can cancel your registration by submitting a completed cancellation request form to a HSBC branch in Hong Kong.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><a href="/content/dam/hsbc/hk/docs/ways-to-bank/internet/maintenance-cancellation-form.pdf" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><span aria-hidden="true">Download the Personal Internet Banking cancellation request form (PDF)</span><span class="visuallyhidden">Download the Personal Internet Banking cancellation request form (PDF)  This link will open in a new window</span></a></p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>

</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>

    </div>

<div id="content_main_columnControl_31">

            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_30" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">If you have registered with Online Banking and you can't log in, first double-check you entered your details correctly. If you still can't log on, write down the error message and call Customer Services:<br> </p> 
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL">

 <li>HSBC Premier customers: <a href="tel:+852-2233-3322" class="no-link" role="presentation">(852) 2233 3322</a></li> 
 <li>Other customers: <a href="tel:+852-2233-3000" class="no-link" role="presentation">(852) 2233 3000</a></li> 
</ul>

            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_32">
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100 ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_32" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_31" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Change your Personal Internet Banking password immediately then call Customer Services:</p> 
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>HSBC Global Private Banking customers: <a href="tel:+852-2233-3033" class="no-link" role="presentation">(852) 2233 3033</a></li> 
 <li>HSBC Premier Elite customers: <a href="tel:+852-2233-3033" class="no-link" role="presentation">(852) 2233 3033</a></li> 
 <li>HSBC Premier customers: <a href="tel:+852-2233-3322" class="no-link" role="presentation">(852) 2233 3322</a></li>

    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="-469228197__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="-469228197__tab0" class="dropdown-text">How can I keep my data secure when using HSBC Online Banking? </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="-469228197__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_33">
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100 ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_33" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_32" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You play a significant role in your own security. Choose a username and passwords that are difficult for others to guess and keep them confidential.<br> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You should also disable the auto-complete feature on your browser. While this tool can save you a bit of time when entering your Online Banking details, it also makes it easier for others to discover your username and other details.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">To protect your data, you should avoid visiting other websites while you're logged onto Online Banking. When you've finished using Online Banking log off from the service then close your internet browser.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>

    </div>

    </div>

</div>

    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">

            <h3 id="585227831__tab0" class="dropdown-text">How can I stay secure during HSBC Online Banking by using 128-bit encryption? </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="585227831__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_34">
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100 ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_34" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_33" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You can usually view the browser security option to check the encryption method being used.<br> </p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_35">
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100 ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_35" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_34" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">No. Your physical Security Device will be deactivated once you activate Mobile Security Key. </p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="content_main_advanced_expander_33" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="-258615827__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="-258615827__tab0" class="dropdown-text">I do not use Mobile Security Key. Can I still log on to HSBC Online Banking and HSBC HK App? </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="-258615827__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_36">
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100 ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_36" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_35" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You will not be able to log on to the HSBC HK App without Mobile Security Key.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You can still log on to HSBC Online Banking using your Personal Internet Banking username and password. However, you will be required to verify and select whether to trust your browser if you're using it to log on to HSBC Online Banking for the first time. To verify your browser as a trusted browser, you will need to generate a security code from your physical Security Device or complete SMS verification.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>

</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="content_main_advanced_expander_34" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="-2013782499__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="-2013782499__tab0" class="dropdown-text">Why am I asked to verify my browser when logging on? </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="-2013782499__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_37">
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100 ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_37" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_36" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">This is part of our security measures to protect our customers from unauthorized access. You will be required to do so when you log on to HSBC Online Banking with a new or untrusted browser. Once you verify and trust your browser, you will be able to log on seamlessly without additional verification in the future. Please only trust browsers if you're accessing them through a reliable personal device. Avoid doing so on public devices, such as computers in cafes and libraries.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You may not be able to trust your browser if it is in private/incognito mode, you've blocked cookies in browser settings, or use any browser that will clear cookies automatically. You will be asked to verify your browser again.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="-726919474__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">

        </div>
        <section id="-726919474__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">

            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_38">
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100 ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_38" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_37" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You may not be able to trust your browser if it is in private/incognito mode, you've blocked cookies in browser settings, or use any browser that will clear cookies automatically.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">If there are certain changes to your device or browser between your previous log on and your current one, such as a software version update or cookies have expired or been cleared, you will be required to verify your browser again for security reasons.</p>
</div></div>

    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="-1112593407__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="-1112593407__tab0" class="dropdown-text">What is the eStatements and eAdvice service? What are the benefits? </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="-1112593407__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_40">
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100 ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_40" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_38" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">By signing up for this service you can manage your statements and advice messages through mobile or online banking anytime, anywhere.<br> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">This environmentally friendly service helps you cut paper clutter. You'll also get your account information faster. You still have the option to print eStatements and eAdvice for your records and can also save the files to your computer.</p> 
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>Free of charge</li> 
 <li>Simple to use - simple online service registration and automatic registration for newly-opened accounts.</li> 
 <li>Secured platform - single secured platform for various account statements and advices.</li> 
 <li>Timely and convenient - access your eStatements anytime, anywhere once they are uploaded.  You can view and download* eStatements up to 7 years (84 months), and eAdvice for the past 3 months.</li> 
</ul> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">   <span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">*Available on online banking only</span></p> 
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>Thoughtful reminders - get push notification, email and/or SMS alerts when the latest eStatements are uploaded.</li> 
</ul>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You can apply online by going to 'Banking' from the top menu > 'eStatements & eAdvices' >  'Statement and advice preferences'. Your registration will be effective immediately.</p>

            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="645552694__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_44">

            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_42" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Yes, registration for an 'either-to-sign' joint account can be done by either person.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Once you've registered your joint account, the other holder will no longer get paper statements or advice slips. If they want to receive these, they will need to register for eStatements and eAdvice.</p>

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Yes. You can use the service for selected accounts only by going to 'Banking' from the top menu > 'eStatements & eAdvices' > 'Statement and advice preferences'. For green cardholders, if you uncheck the account for online access, your eStatement will be sent to your designated password-protected email address.</p>

            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_46">
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100 ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_46" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_44" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You should receive eStatements or eAdvice the day following the statement or advice generation date. To keep these records for future reference, you can download the files and save them to your computer.<br> </p>

<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Where your document will be downloaded to will depend on what browser you're using.</p>

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">To avoid missing eStatements and eAdvice, update your email address via the HSBC HK Mobile Banking app or HSBC Online Banking at anytime. Instructions on how to update can be found on the <a href="/mobile/faq/#cp">'Change contact details' page</a>.  </p>

            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_53" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">If you have not yet set up your own password, we'll protect your files with a pre-set password.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">The password will be a 9-digit password containing:</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Part 1 -The last digit of your month of birth and last 2 digits of your year of birth <br> Part 2 -The first 3 alpha numeric characters of your Hong Kong Identity Card (HKID) or passport number<br> Part 3 -The last 3 digits of your mobile phone number provided for our record</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Password example<br> Date of birth: 17 / 1<strong>2</strong> / 19<strong>85</strong><br> HKID number: <strong>A12</strong>3456(7)<br> Mobile phone number: 98785<strong>432</strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Your password for the first time log in will therefore be: <strong>285 A12 432</strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">For security reasons, we will request you to change this password when you first logon to the system to view your eStatement / eAdvice.</p>
</div></div>

    <div id="content_main_accordion_4" class="accordions-container sm-12">

    <div id="content_main_advanced_expander_52" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="284674402__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h4 id="284674402__tab0" class="dropdown-text">What is 'Pay & transfer'?  </h4>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="284674402__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_58">
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100 ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_58" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_54" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">'Pay & transfer' is a single place for managing all your payments and transfers from your HSBC accounts worldwide. With 'Pay & transfer' from homepage top menu, you can:</p> 
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>Transfer money to HSBC and non-HSBC accounts in Hong Kong dollars or different currencies, locally and overseas*.</li> 
 <li>Set-up payees* to send money to them faster without using your Security Device / Mobile Secure Key.</li> 
 <li>Transfer money between your own accounts (both local and international), even in different currencies.</li> 
 <li>Set up and manage future-dated or recurring payments*.</li> 
 <li>Pay bills* to a wide range of merchants and settle your taxes*.</li> 
</ul> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">*Note: These payments and transfer require Security Device / Mobile Secure Key</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>

        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="-1675482062__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h4 id="-1675482062__tab0" class="dropdown-text">How can I register an account as "My payees"? Do I need my Security Device / Mobile Security Key? </h4>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="-1675482062__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_59">

            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_55" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">There are 2 ways to register a third-party account to "My Payees".</p> 
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>You can visit 'Pay & transfer' from the top menu > 'Manage payees / payments' > 'Add a new payee'  > 'Add a new payee' tab on top left hand side to add new payee with your Security Device / Mobile Security Key</li> 
 <li>You can save new payee details in a transaction form by ticking the check box "Add to your payee list". After the transfer is authenticated with your Security Device / Mobile Security Key, the new payee's details will be added.</li> 
</ul> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">The new payee instructions will be effective on the next working day when submitted before 9pm from Mon to Fri or 6pm on Sat. Instructions will be effective in two working days when submitted after 9pm from Mon to Fri or 6pm on Sat or on Public Holiday.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"> </p>
</div></div>

            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_56" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">There are 2 ways to find payee list.</p> 
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>You can find it under 'Pay & transfer' from the top menu > 'Manage payees / payments' >  ' View / delete your payees'.</li> 
 <li>You can find it under 'To account' selection, when you perform 3rd parties account transfers/ payments.</li> 
</ul>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="content_main_advanced_expander_55" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="671073990__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h4 id="671073990__tab0" class="dropdown-text"> How can I change my payee's details? </h4>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="671073990__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_61">
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100 ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_61" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_57" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Payees details cannot be amended, only the transfer limit for each payee can be changed. If you want to change the payee's details, you have to delete the payee record first and add back again.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">To delete a payee, you can find them under 'Pay & transfer' from the top menu > 'Manage payees / payments' > ' View / delete your payees' and click '⋮' icon next to the payee and 'Delete'.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">To add a payee, please refer to FAQ "How can I register an account as "My payees"? Do I need my Security Device / Mobile Security Key?"</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="content_main_advanced_expander_56" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="1230495092__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h4 id="1230495092__tab0" class="dropdown-text">Why do I have to wait for 6 hours after adding a new payee before I can proceed with Global Transfers to third-party HSBC accounts? </h4>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="1230495092__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_62">
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100 ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_62" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_58" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">In order to protect you during payment transfer, the instruction to add a new payee will come into effect after 6 hours. You can make only one transfer to each new payee before it is active. Transfers will be processed (and the corresponding daily transfer limit will be consumed) after payee becomes active. There will be email and SMS notification to confirm you once the transfer is done. </p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="content_main_advanced_expander_57" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="-2004801830__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h4 id="-2004801830__tab0" class="dropdown-text">Can I add multiple new payees and make global transfers to their HSBC accounts before they become active? </h4>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="-2004801830__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_63">
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100 ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_63" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_59" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Yes, you can add multiple payees and make only one global transfer to each of them before each payee is active. However, the transfer will only be processed once the payee is active. There will be email and SMS notifications to confirm you once the transfer is done. </p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="content_main_advanced_expander_58" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="1751487065__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h4 id="1751487065__tab0" class="dropdown-text">Will I be allowed to place Global Transfer instructions to the newly added payee's HSBC account before the payee is active? </h4>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="1751487065__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_64">
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100 ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_64" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_60" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Yes, you can make one Global Transfer instruction to each newly added payees before the payees become active. However, the transfer will only be processed (and the corresponding daily transfer limit will be consumed) once the payee is active. Moreover, if you would like to cancel the transfer instruction before payee is active, go to 'Pay & transfer' > 'Pending global transfers', select a particular transaction and click on 'Cancel' to cancel the transfer instruction. Please note that the new payee would also be deleted along with the transfer cancellation instruction. </p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">

            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="2094607568__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">

            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_65">

        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_65" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_61" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You will receive both email and SMS notifications when 'Add a new payee' instructions are placed, and another set of email and SMS when the global transfers to the newly added payees are processed. </p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>

    </div>

            <h4 id="1279342012__tab0" class="dropdown-text">Can I cancel the Global Transfer initiated to the newly added payee's HSBC account before the payee is active? </h4>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="1279342012__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">

            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_66">

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Yes, you can cancel the global transfer to the newly added payee's HSBC account before the payee is active. You may go to 'Pay & transfer' tab, then 'Pending global transfers' via HSBC Online Banking. Select a particular transfer and click on 'Cancel' to cancel the transfer instruction. If you cancel the transfer instruction before payee is active, the new payee would also be deleted along with the transfer cancellation instruction. </p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You cannot change future dated payment. Please go to  “Pay & transfer > Manage payees / payments > View / delete future dated payments” page on Online Banking, find "⋮" symbol to the right of your instruction, then delete existing instruction and place a new one.<br> </p>

            <h4 id="-1489940265__tab0" class="dropdown-text">What is Quick Transfer? </h4>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="-1489940265__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_68">

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">'Quick Transfer' is a feature found in the 'Quick Links' on your account dashboard after logging in to Online Banking. This is the fastest way to transfer money between your own HSBC Hong Kong accounts immediately in Hong Kong dollars. If you wish to transfer to your payees instead, please go to 'Pay & transfer' on the top menu to select your desired payment journey.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>

    </div>

    </div>

</div>

    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
